656:1: atha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
656:4: yaṃ jñātvā sarvamantracaryāniyogayuktāḥ sarvasattvā sarvamantrāṇāṃ kālākālaṃ jñāsyanate |
656:6: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru |
656:8: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto utthāyāsanādekāṃśamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ siṃhāsanaṃ tenāñjalimupanāmya trirapi pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantametadavocat |
656:13: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ mañjuśriyasya kumārabhūtasya sādhukāramadāt |
656:14: sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ ! yastvaṃ tathāgatametamarthaṃ paripraśnitavyaṃ manyase |
656:17: atha bhagavāṃ sarvāvatīṃ parṣadamavalokya sarvabhūtarutapracodanī nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma |
656:18: samanantarasamāpannasya bhagavataḥ ye kecit sattvānantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu sthitā sarve te buddharaśmyāvabhāsitā sarvāṃśca tāṃ buddhāṃ bhagavatāṃ śirasā praṇamya anantāparyantalokadhātusthitāṃ abhyarcayena bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ śuddhāvāsabhavanoparisthitaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ tenopajagmuḥ |
656:19: yena ca sahā lokadhātuḥ tena ca pratyaṣṭhāt |
656:20: tatra ca sthitā sarvabhūtagaṇā buddhānubhāvena svakaṃ svakaṃ rutaṃ vidarśayantaḥ bhagavataḥ pādamūlasamīpopagatā dharmaśravaṇāya |
656:21: bhagavantaṃ praṇamya mabhyarcya ca yathāsthāneṣu ca sanniṣaṇṇā abhūvaṃ dharmaśravaṇāya ||
656:22: atha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ śākyasiṃho śākyarājādhitanayaḥ teṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ dhārmyā kathāyā sandarśayati samuttejayati sampraharṣayati teṣāṃ sarvabhūtasureśvarāṇāṃ tathā tathā dharmadeśanā kṛtavāṃ yathā taiḥ sarvaiḥ kaiścidanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhaucityānyutpāditāni |
656:23: kaiścit pratyekāyāṃ voko kaiścicchrāvakatve kaiścitkaiścit satyāni dṛṣṭvāni kaiścidarhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ kaiścid daśakuśale karmapathe sthitvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam |
656:24: anantāṃ buddhāṃ bhagavataḥ anantāṃ kalpakoṭīṣvajopasthānaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapradānaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanapariṣkāraṃ pradadyāpa iti niyatā ca bhaviṣyāmo buddhabodheriti ||
656:25: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāmāśayaṃ jñātvā mantraṃ bhāṣate sma sarvabhūtarutābhijñā nāma |
656:26: yaṃ sādhayitvā sarvabodhisattvāḥ sarvasattvāśca rutaṃ vijāneyuḥ ekakṣaṇena sarveṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ yathāgocaramasthitānām |
656:31: ādau tāvanmahāraṇyaṃ gatvā kṣīrayāvakāhāraḥ mūlaphalaśākāhāro vā akṣaralakṣaṃ japet |
656:32: triḥkālasnāyinā valkalavāsasā pūrvavat sarvaṃ vidhinā kartavyam |
656:34: tataḥ pūrvasevāṃ kṛtvā akṣaralakṣasyānte tatraiva sādhanamārabhet |
656:36: agnikuṇḍaṃ kṛtvā dvihastapramāṇaṃ caturhastavistīrṇaṃ samantāccaturaśraṃ sarvapuṣpaphalairarghyaṃ datvā prāṅmukhaḥ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ navamagnimutpādya kṣīravṛkṣakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya śrīphalaphalānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
656:38: tato pūrvāyāṃ diśi mahāvabhāsaṃ kṛtvā buddho bhagavānāgacchati |
656:40: aparāmṛṣṭe sādhake tatkṣaṇādeva bhagavato vācā niścarate - siddhastvaṃ gaccha yatheṣṭam,
656:42: tataḥprabhṛti sādhakaḥ pañcābhijño bhavati mahāprabhāvadivyamūrttiḥ bodhisattvācāraḥ dviraṣṭavarṣākṛtiḥ yatheṣṭagatiḥ sarvabhūtarutajñaḥ,
656:43: ekakṣaṇamātreṇa sarvabhūtānāṃ rutaṃ vijānīte prabhavaśca bhavati yatheṣṭagāmī |
656:46: viṃśatibhiḥ sādhanapraveśairniyataṃ sidhyatīti nātra vicikitsā kāryā prasādhitasyāpi na mantraṃ japatā pūrvamāditaścaiva madhye caiva nibodhatām ||
656:47: rutajñānaṃ prabhāvaṃ ca svabhāvaṃ caiva kīrtyate |
656:49: bhāṣitaṃ kathyate loke madhyadeśe ca kīrtitā |
656:52: tathā te devarāṭ sarve mantrāṃ vavre svabhāvataḥ ||
656:53: tridaśo madhyadeśe ca vatsa paśya daśārṇavā |
656:54: amante yathā vācā tathā deśeṣu jāyate ||
656:64: tathā sarvato vakrā dṛṣṭyā caiva supūjitā ||
656:65: bhavante te sadā devā madhyadeśe savācakā |
656:67: meghagarjanā teṣāṃ vācaiṣā tāṃ tu lakṣayet |
656:71: abhāvādāśrayāt teṣāṃ na vācāṃ jagmire surāḥ |
656:72: adhaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ surāḥ sarve madhyadeśeṣu vācakā ||
656:74: atha devāmatha bhūmyā vai yakṣāścaiva maharddhikāḥ ||
656:80: sarvadevagaṇā śreṣṭhā vācā hyeṣā tu kīrtyate ||
656:85: tathā devālaye vāṇī madhuraṃ cāpi sūktajitā |
656:86: rutaṃ mataṃ tathā jñeyaṃ karmeṣveva niyojayet ||
656:89: tathā daityagaṇā śreṣṭhaṃ rutaṃ cāpi niyojayet |
656:94: sarveṣāṃ janapadāaṃ vā tathā teṣāṃ tu kalpayet ||
656:96: devānāṃ ca tathā nityaṃ purogānāṃ parikīrtayet ||
656:98: nāgāṃścaiva sadā kāle yathā vācā nibodhatām ||
656:99: lāḍodreṣu tathā sindhau yathā muttarato tathā |
656:100: janeṣveva hi sarvatra tāṃ tu teṣāṃ niyojayet ||
656:101: nāgānāṃ ca yathā lāḍī vācā hyuktā manīṣiṇī |
656:102: yakṣāṇāṃ tu tathā vācā uttarāṃ diśi ye narāḥ ||
656:103: garuḍānāṃ yathā hyedre kinnarāṇāṃ tu kīrtyate |
656:104: nepāle sarvato vācā yathā sā tāṃ nibodhatām ||
656:106: vindhyajātā manuṣyāṇāṃ mlecchānāṃ ca yā vācā ||
656:107: pūtanānāṃ tu sā jñeyā vācaiṣāṃ parikīrtitā |
656:108: rākṣasānāṃ yathā vācā tāṃ vavre surottamā ||
656:111: tāṃ tu vācā samālakṣye rākṣaseṣveva niyojayet |
656:114: sarvato trividhā jñeyā deśabhāṣāśca te tridhā ||
656:115: triḥprakāraṃ tathā karma trideśaṃ caiva yojayet |
656:116: trividhaḥ sarvato jñeyaḥ trividhaṃ karma rutaṃ smṛtam ||
656:126: liṅgamarthaṃ tathā pātraṃ devaṃ caiva niyojayet ||
656:127: śreyasā śreyase caiva āveśānāṃ tu lakṣayet |
656:131: te tu vyaktaṃ narā jñeyā mlecchabhāṣāratā hi te |
656:134: dakṣiṇātyā yathā vācā cañcalā bhavati ninditā ||
656:136: bahudhā rutayā jyeṣṭhā āviṣṭānāṃ tu trijāparām ||
656:137: ākṛṣṭā mantribhiḥ kṣipraṃ svayaṃ vā iha māgatā |
656:138: bahudhā gṛhṇanti sattvānāṃ mātarā sagrahā surā ||
656:146: teṣā nordhvaṃ gatā dṛṣṭi ardho dṛk nordhvagatā hi te ||
656:151: garuḍānāṃ tathā vācā āviṣṭānāṃ tu lakṣayet |
656:160: svena svena tu kāyena yo liṅgena tu lakṣayet ||
656:161: tena tena tu liṅgena taṃ taṃ sattvaṃ vinirdiśet |
656:162: kaśmalā kathitā sarve adho dṛṣṭigatā hi te ||
656:167: āviṣṭānāṃ bhuvi martyānāṃ kathitā liṅgāni vai sadā |
656:169: tathaiva tad yojayet kṣipraṃ bhūmirmānuṣatāṃ gatāḥ |
656:171: nirīkṣante tathā cordhvaṃ diśāṃ caiva samantataḥ |
656:174: prasannaglatyā tathā sarve suraśreṣṭhā nu lakṣayet ||
656:180: teṣāṃ rūpadharā kāntiḥ āśrayā te parivartaye ||
656:189: ṛṣiṇā kathitā hyete saṃyatā te ṛṣavasthitā |
656:190: āviṣṭānāṃ tadā liṅgā ṛṣīṇāṃ kathitā mayā ||
656:193: mātarāṇāṃ tadevaṃ tu keṣāṃ ceva tu dṛśyate |
656:194: kravyādā nagnakā tiṣṭhe sacelā niścelatāṃ gatā ||
656:206: teṣāṃ ca kathitaṃ liṅgaṃ caritaṃ tu vibhāvitam ||
656:210: āviṣṭānāṃ tathā liṅgā kathitā bhūtale nṛṇām ||
656:217: tat sarvaṃ bodhayet kṣipraṃ mantriṇe cintitaṃ tu yat |
656:220: nabhāṣa madhuraṃ vācaṃ na yajño satvarā surāḥ ||
656:221: niḥśreṣṭhā vivaśā caiva sthitā te maunamāśritāḥ |
656:222: na vācā kiñcanasteṣāṃ na cittā nāpi mānitā ||
656:223: tasmāt taṃ na cākṛṣye taṃ jāpī parivartayet |
656:225: nākṛṣyaṃ vidyate kiñcid duṣkaraṃ teṣāṃ japtamantrārthatāpinām |
656:233: nānye mantrarāṭ śaktā laukikā ye maharddhikā |
656:235: varṇituṃ gaṇayituṃ gantuṃ taṃ sthānaṃ yatra te sadā |
656:239: tasmāt taṃ na cālaye yatnā na vṛthāmarthena yojayet |
656:241: aśaktā sarvamantrā vai gantuṃ yatra te tadā |
656:246: dhīro gambhīratāṃ yāto alpabāṣpo bhavet tadā ||
656:275: parāmṛśyantaṃ tadā vajraṃ mudrāṃ vadhnāti mātmanām |
656:276: tuṣṭo varado martyāṃ bhogāṃ dāpayate sadā ||
656:277: mahātmā kṛṣṇavarṇo vai īṣi dṛśyati tatkṣaṇāt |
656:279: nṛṇāṃ kimarthametaṃ vo karmavaraṃ dāsyāma vo bhuve |
656:281: varadā saprabhā mantrā phalaṃ dadyustadā tadā |
656:285: nirmāṇā kathyate bimbaṃ na bimbaṃ nirmāṇamāśṛtam |
656:295: laukikānāṃ tu mantrāṇāṃ mantranāthaṃ tu yojayet |
656:297: taṃ niyuñjya tadā mantrī mantreṣveva ca sarvataḥ |
656:299: svaliṅgā vācayā caiva taṃ niyuñjyatha mantriṇām |
656:300: bahuliṅgā tadā caiṣā svaliṅgā caiva sādhaye ||
656:303: eṣa kālakramo yoge āveśe caiva yojayet |
656:305: niyuñjyāt sarvato mantrī japtamātrāṃ ca cetarām |
656:309: itarāṃ laukikāṃ devāṃ āhvaye caiva maharddhikām |
656:312: anyamantrā na cāhveyā nānye devagaṇā sadā ||
656:313: svayamevāgatā ye tu samaye tāṃ niyojayet |
656:315: taṃ tasmā netarāṃ karmaṃ āveśāṃ cāpi varjayet |
656:316: ākṛṣṭā maharddhikā devā divyā āryāśca bhūmijā |
656:322: sāgarā bhramate kṣipraṃ patate ca muhurmuhuḥ |
656:324: vividhā nāgavare hyete antāntā teṣu nibodhatām |
656:325: kecid bhāvayato hṛṣṭo kecit tiṣṭhanti niścalam ||
656:327: patanti vividhākāraṃ plutaṃ cāpi karoti vai ||
656:334: te tu mantrā sadā yojyā daṣṭāviṣṭeṣu sarvataḥ |
656:339: aśeṣaṃ kathitaṃ hyetaṃ daṣṭaviṣṭaṃ va lakṣaṇam ||
656:341: nārakānāṃ tu bhāṣāṃ vā kathyamānāṃ nibodhatām ||
656:344: tadā te kathaye vācāṃ rephaṃyuktāṃ sabhairavām |
656:346: kathayanti bhayaṃ tatra kṣudhā caiva ca darśayet |
656:348: krūrāṃ darśayed vācāṃ bhayaṃ tatra nivedayet |
656:351: tadā te kathayantyete tāṃ vācāṃ bhayabhairavām ||
656:353: teṣāṃ kṣīrasamaṃ deyaṃ toyaṃ caiva sukhodayam ||
656:362: rodamāne tadā sarve sattvānāṃ ca niveditā |
656:365: āgatya grāmavāse'smiṃ kathayanti yathā hi tam ||
656:369: yadā dakṣiṇato gacche mṛgā gacchetha magratam ||
656:370: siddhiṃ ca nirdiśante tāḥ mṛgāścaiva supuṣkalām |
656:372: na gacchet tatra medhāvī jambūkaiśca nivāritaḥ |
656:373: praviśet svālayaṃ kṣipraṃ kathayāmāsa te tadā ||
656:378: cāṣā ca pakṣiṇā sarve mṛgāścaiva sajambukā |
656:381: kathayāmāsa te sarvaṃ gaccha pūjyo bhaviṣyasi ||
656:383: mārge yadi dṛśyate sthānagacchet kutra vā kvacit ||
656:385: gacchatāṃ svakamāvāsaṃ svastho tiṣṭhati sve gṛhe ||
656:386: na gacchet tatra mantrajño uragaistu niveditam |
656:387: yadi gacchet tadā kālaṃ udvego mṛtyu vā bhavet ||
656:391: kecit tiryagatā divyāḥ mānuṣā bhāṣiṇo tadā ||
656:392: yo'yaṃ nivedaye vācāṃ taṃ tathaiva niyojayet |
656:402: sa jñeyā mānuṣī vācā rutaṃ caiva svabhāvataḥ |
656:406: bhṛśaṃ tatra haret kṣipraṃ taruṃ tasya sudāruṇam |
656:407: rudyate paśurājā vai karuṇaṃ dīna nivedayet ||
656:410: paścime mahad bhayaṃ vidyāt dakṣiṇe śāntikāmatām |
656:416: catvāro matha pañcā vā sapta ṣaṣṭha nibodhitā |
656:421: yathā siṃhe tathā sarvaṃ sarvaprāṇiṣu yojayet ||
656:422: śarabhaiḥ śārdūlākhyairvai yathā tata sarva nibodhatām |
656:424: kintu prāsādikaṃ jñānaṃ katthyate tāṃ surottamām |
656:425: kroṣṭukeṣu ca sarvatra tāṃ tathaiva niyojayet ||
656:426: pūrvapaścimato bhāge yadā hastī ruded bhṛśam |
656:427: tasmānmahad bhayaṃ vidyāt tatra deśeṣu jantunām ||
656:431: gacchato vāmataḥ kāko bhṛśaṃ rauti sudāruṇam ||
656:432: na gacchet tatra medhāvī vāyasena niveditam |
656:434: na gacchet tatra mantrajño gacchan mṛtyuvaśo bhavet |
656:435: gomayaṃ bhakṣayet pakṣī yadā rauti sukhodayam ||
656:440: suśubhaṃ kūjate kṣipraṃ madhuraṃ cāpi bhāṣitam |
656:442: gṛhadvāraṃ yadā paśyaṃ vāyaso ravato bhṛśam |
656:443: tatra rātrau bhavet tasya śastrasampāta cauribhiḥ ||
656:451: tat sarvaṃ siṃhato jñeyaṃ śivānnu sarvadā ||
656:454: sarve śivagaṇā proktā śāyamprāte ca śobhanā |
656:456: śivā śivatamā proktā dvitīyā rāve tu kīrtyate |
656:457: tṛtīye rāve tathā jñeyā rājñe artthāvahā bhavet ||
656:458: caturtthe tu mahālābhaṃ pañcame putradā smṛtā |
656:459: ṣaṣṭhe ca dhananiṣpattiḥ saptame na bhave śubhā ||
656:461: evaṃ karoti śivā tatra asaṅkhyeyā te'pyaniṣṭadā ||
656:466: ṣaṣṭhe corāgamaṃ vidyā sarvatastu śivā tu sā |
656:469: utareṇa tu yo rāvo śivāyāḥ śrūyate sadā ||
656:471: dvitīye krūrarāve tu duḥkhadā sā bhavet tadā ||
656:475: aṣṭame niḥphalaṃ vidyā tadūrdhvaṃ yaḥ kiñci roditi ||
656:476: pūrveṇa ca yadā rauti śivā yāme tu mantime |
656:477: tadā rājāgamaṃ vidyā dvitīyārāve tu preṣiṇām ||
656:478: tṛtīyaṃ rājato mṛtyuḥ baddho vā yadi śrūyate |
656:480: ṣaṣṭhe ca bhavate vyādhiḥ saptame agnito bhayam |
656:481: aṣṭame niḥphalaṃ vidyā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat sadā ||
656:483: prathamena bhavet saukhyaṃ dvitīye sarvato janām ||
656:488: nirdiśe ca dhruvā jñeyā śivā krūratamā smṛtā |
656:492: ṣaṣṭhe mlecchināṃ hanti saptame taskarā tadā |
656:497: dvitīyena hanyate hastī rājño mukhyo gajottamam ||
656:500: pañcame dhananāśaṃ tu ṣaṣṭhe vyādhi sambhavet |
656:501: saptamena bhave duḥkhaṃ sarvato ca bhayāvaham ||
656:502: aṣṭame niḥphalaṃ vidyā pūrvaṃ vai sarvato tadā |
656:504: atikrūrā yadā kṣipraṃ śivā vyāharate tadā |
656:506: atikrūrā yadā kṣipraṃ śivā vyāharate tadā |
656:510: caturthena bhaved vyādhiḥ sarveṣāṃ ca tadā jane |
656:511: pañcame hanyate putro amātyo vā nṛpaterdhruvam ||
656:513: saptamena haned rāṣṭraṃ muktaṃ cāpi vinirdiśet ||
656:514: aṣṭame niḥphalaṃ vidyā pūrvavat kathitā sadā |
656:515: ataḥ ūrdhvaṃ tathā rāvo śivānāṃ ca bhave yadā ||
656:531: paśuveṣakṛtā kecid dṛṣṭyā naṣṭā ca jantuṣu ||
656:532: vividhaṃ karoti sarve te sarvatra vasudhātale |
656:545: jñeyaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ sarvaṃ krūraiḥ saumyaiśca liṅgibhiḥ ||
656:546: chatraṃ śitaṃ patākaṃ ca matsaṃ māṃsaṃ ca sārdrayoḥ |
656:547: utkṣiptā ca medīnī padmayantra gomayaṃ tadā ||
656:548: dadhi puṣpaṃ phalaṃ caiva striyaṃ vāmbarabhūṣitām |
656:550: vṛṣaṃ gajaṃ tathā jñeyaṃ aśvaṃ cāmarabhūṣitam |
656:557: etā nimittā māvedya iṣṭāṃ caiva niveditām ||
656:563: ādhyeṣṭyo bhavennityaṃ taṃ liṅgī paśyato phalam ||
656:566: yo yamiṣṭataraṃ paśyet so tasyaiva phalodayam |
656:567: vācāṃ bahuvidhāṃ vavre yadā te mānuṣā bhuvi ||
656:569: pareṣāṃ ca yadā vavre viśvastāśca samantataḥ ||
656:570: evaṃ ca vācire mūcuḥ śubhaṃ śreyaṃ japaṃ sadā |
656:576: jinaṃ padma tathā vajraṃ lokeśaṃ bodhimuttamam |
656:579: śuśrāva śabdāṃ yathā gantā sarvāsāṃ prāpnuyā hi sau ||
656:580: tato'nye lokavidviṣṭaṃ sa śabdaṃ cāpi ninditam |
656:581: praśastā śakunayo hyetā prasthitānāṃ jape ratām ||
656:583: tato'nya ninditaṃ sarva na lebhe kāyitaṃ phalam ||
656:584: praśastaiva sarvato gacche apraśastaiśca na vrajet |
656:586: svamantraṃ mantranāthaṃ ca mātāpitrau tha duḥkarām |
656:587: praṇamya sarvato gacche śivaṃ tatra vinirdiśet ||
